column4: hey all i just got 2 monitors running on this pc with twin view every thing works except once i log into GDM.. my Xsession switches me back to using one monitor
is there a way to fix this?
: you have to enable Xinerama in xorg or press the function key that change the monitor setting on your laptop (if it is a laptop)
i have twinview enabled and both displays come up for gdm but it goes back to a single display when gnome loads
